Package org.springcorebankapp.logging

Class AspectService

java.lang.Object
org.springcorebankapp.logging.AspectService
@Component public class AspectService extends Object
Aspect for logging method calls, their arguments, return values, and exceptions in the service layer of the SpringCoreBankApp project.

This aspect is applied to methods in the org.springcorebankapp.account and org.springcorebankapp.user packages, logging method executions with their input arguments, return values, and any exceptions that occur.

The logging levels used are:

  • DEBUG for method calls and input arguments
  • INFO for successful method executions with results
  • ERROR for methods that raise exceptions
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • serviceMethodsPointcut

      public void serviceMethodsPointcut()
      Pointcut definition for all methods in the org.springcorebankapp.account and org.springcorebankapp.user packages.

      This pointcut is used to intercept method executions within these service packages.

    • logBefore

      public void logBefore(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
      Advice executed before the methods matching the pointcut.

      This method logs the details of the method being called and its arguments. The log level is DEBUG.

      Parameters:
      joinPoint - provides information about the intercepted method and its arguments

    • logAfterReturning

      public void logAfterReturning(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint, Object result)
      Advice executed after the methods matching the pointcut return successfully.

      This method logs the return value of the method after it has executed successfully. The log level is INFO.

      Parameters:
      joinPoint - provides information about the executed method
      result - the result returned by the method

    • logAfterThrowing

      public void logAfterThrowing(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint, Throwable exception)
      Advice executed if a method matching the pointcut throws an exception.

      This method logs the exception raised by the method. The log level is ERROR.

      Parameters:
      joinPoint - provides information about the executed method
      exception - the exception thrown by the method
